p: Curiously, all of the models predicted expansions of the areas occupied by those horned frog species (with the exception of C. stolzmanni) within ecological reserve areas in approaching decades ( Fig 2). Those models likewise suggest that the expansions of those species will occur in response to the gradual intensification and expansion of semi-arid environments (and alteration in regime of rains) in South America until 2080 ( Fig 3).
